Iconic Places.

Enduring Value.

Emaar Properties ranks among Dubai’s leading off‑plan developers, delivering high‑ROI, high‑appreciation assets across flagship communities supported by government backing and a DFM listing that enhances investor confidence and liquidity.

Why

Emaar?

Strong track record in delivering high‑ROI apartments and high‑capital appreciation assets in Dubai’s most coveted locations.

High ROI & Appreciation
Proven performance across apartments and master communities known for sustained value growth.
Flagship Master‑planning
Downtown Dubai, Dubai Creek Harbour, Emirates Hills, Arabian Ranches, and Dubai Hills define the city’s skyline.
Top Off‑plan Ranking
Consistently ranked among the top off‑plan developers, offering liquidity and appreciation in premium zones.
Government‑backed & DFM‑listed
Enhanced credibility, transparency, and exit liquidity for investors seeking safer exposure.
Delivery Reliability
Established execution capabilities across large‑scale, mixed‑use developments.


Brand Trust
Enduring global reputation for quality assets that attract end‑users and investors alike.

High ROI & Appreciation
Proven performance across apartments and master communities known for sustained value growth.
Flagship Master‑planning
Downtown Dubai, Dubai Creek Harbour, Emirates Hills, Arabian Ranches, and Dubai Hills define the city’s skyline.
Top Off‑plan Ranking
Consistently ranked among the top off‑plan developers, offering liquidity and appreciation in premium zones.

Government‑backed & DFM‑listed
Enhanced credibility, transparency, and exit liquidity for investors seeking safer exposure.
Delivery Reliability
Established execution capabilities across large‑scale, mixed‑use developments.
Brand Trust
Enduring global reputation for quality assets that attract end‑users and investors alike.

Iconic Emaar

Destinations

Emaar’s master‑planned communities anchor Dubai’s premium living and investment corridors.

○ Downtown Dubai — home to record‑setting landmarks & prime retail

○ Dubai Creek Harbour — next‑gen waterfront with vibrant promenades

○ Emirates Hills — ultra‑luxury golf‑side villas

○ Arabian Ranches — family‑centric suburban living

○ Dubai Hills — green master community with parks & golf

High liquidity & appreciation

Premium addresses like Downtown & Creek Harbour sustain strong secondary demand.

Government‑backed & DFM‑listed

Greater transparency and confidence for institutional and retail investors.

Track record of ROI

Consistent delivery of apartment assets with competitive yields and capital growth.

Key

Notes

2024 Sales Performance

Emaar delivered AED 65.4 billion in property sales in 2024, with an AED 90.9 billion backlog.

Profitability (Q1 2025)

Net profit of AED 7.08 billion in Q1 2025, up 33% year‑on‑year.

Community Portfolio

Flagships include Downtown Dubai, Dubai Creek Harbour, Emirates Hills, Arabian Ranches, and Dubai Hills.

Investment Profile

Ranked among the top off‑plan developers in Dubai; government‑backed and DFM‑listed, offering safer, more liquid exposure.
